extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the Official Android App for DeVry University.***The 2.5 Update is Here Download it Today!***--------------Signing Into the app---------------The Home sign in screen requires you to use your Student Portal login user name and password from my.devry.edu.The Go To Class sign in requires you to use your eCollege login user name and password from devryu.net.---------------------------------------------------------DeVry Mobile is the new mobile connection to DeVry University and the DeVry University eLearning platform.Highlights Include:Posting to Threaded DiscussionsReviewing your scheduleChecking your gradesAsk DeVry Resetting your DeVry portal and DeVryU eLearning passwords---------------------------------------------------------We look forward to the continued progress and improvement of this App for your student experience.  Your feedback is needed and it is greatly appreciated, keep it coming!Sincerely,DeVry IT Mobile Support

reviews.title: Still needs some work.
reviews.comment: Once in the go to class, you cannot get back to the main menu unless you log out and close browser.
reviews.author: James Walsborn

reviews.title: Major improvement
reviews.comment: App still doesn\'t work. I find it amazing that with all of the poor ratings, you still haven\'t tried to resolve the issue.  Update: The app works very well now and future updates are in the works.
reviews.author: brian noble

reviews.title: It logs in now.
reviews.comment: Discussion threads need better organization. Why do i have to log in multiple times?
reviews.author: Patrick Neckolaishen

reviews.title: Improvement
reviews.comment: Just did an update and it is working much better. I am now able to log in to my classes!! I love convenience of seeing my schedule and grades. Thanks for fix and update!
reviews.author: Millie L

reviews.title: Crashing
reviews.comment: My app kept crashing while looking at my schedule and the user interface is terrible.
reviews.author: Uriel Melchor

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note II
reviews.comment: Glad that the update fixed the issues I noticed. Im satisified with the app. Good work DeVry!
reviews.author: Sierra Bar

reviews.title: Helpful app
reviews.comment: I find the app useful as long as you do not expect to do all of your work with it.  I would like to see a more user friendly organization of the discussions.
reviews.author: L DeGrave

reviews.comment: Worked great for me
reviews.author: Vanessa Martinez

reviews.title: Still can\'t log in
reviews.comment: I want to use this app but still having log in issues
reviews.author: Derrick Ejan

reviews.title: Major improvement..
reviews.comment: A google\302\261 feedback page would be good. A week by week filter would help, awesome job
reviews.author: William Satterthwaite

reviews.title: I find this a little ironic.
reviews.comment: That in Web Design I\'m learning about poor universal usability firsthanded.  Is this app meant to work? I mean, no seriously, is it supposed to? Do you ever fix the bugs or provide updates?   Edit: Would you pay us money to make an app that worked? Honestly, I don\'t know if I\'m comfortable learning app creation from you guys.
reviews.author: Rachel Ellis

reviews.title: doesnt work
reviews.comment: If you favorite part about apps is looking at the word \"loading\" then this is the best app of all time
reviews.author: Mitchell Royer

reviews.title: Login always fails
reviews.comment: I was bound and determined to prove all the 1 stars wrong, but lost all my momentum at the login screen.  It won\'t take my info.  Why is it, the more money we put into school the less we get in our classes, and as soon as it looks like we might be getting something... Fail.
reviews.author: Dustin Baumis

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Won\'t work on my phone or tablet.  I called DeVry technical service and got nowhere after An hour on hold
reviews.author: Jason Mansfield

reviews.title: Doesn\'t load
reviews.comment: This app is horrible!! Never loads anything. Using the mobile browser is much more efficient.
reviews.author: Erik Mullinax

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.comment: Works on my galaxy 3 with a no issues. Brought me to their mobile browser when I chose go to class. The mobile browser is incredibly difficult to use and navigate. Not user friendly at all. This app is getting deleted.
reviews.author: Mike Gill

reviews.title: Loading....
reviews.comment: Loading.... Perfect data connection (I can access the Internet) and all this app does is say loading. Note 2.
reviews.author: James DeBouver

reviews.title: Works for me!
reviews.comment: After seeing that the majority of the feedbacks were negative, I was reluctant in downloading the app. I\'m glad I did! I guess I\'m one of the few that happens to be lucky b/c it works perfectly on my GS3. I haven\'t thoroughly tried every aspect of  the app yet, but I\'ve been able to log in just fine and checked for my grades. Can\'t wait to start posting on this app next term!
reviews.author: Ramil Mendoza

reviews.title: HOT
reviews.comment: This is app it\'s HOT!  Keller students must download the DeVry app and you\'ll be given the opportunity to switch schools before logging in...
reviews.author: richard nelson

reviews.title: Cant login
reviews.comment: cant login, trying with the user/pass on the computer so I know its correct.
reviews.author: michael edlund
